message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exceptional opportunity that I believe will significantly benefit your business. I am offering it to you for $1150000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I must respectfully decline. I am willing to lower the price to $1100000 to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the current market conditions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1075000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $1085000 for the product. This price reflects its true value and allows us to move forward with a transaction that benefits both parties.
